label: Bertrand, Claudia, Daniel H. Janzen, Winnie Hallwachs, John M. Burns, Joel F. Gibson & Mehrdad Hajibabaei.  2014. Mitochondrial and nuclear phylogenetic analysis with Sanger and next-generation sequencing shows that, in Área de Conservación Guanacaste, northwestern Costa Rica, the skipper butterfly named Urbanus belli (family Hesperiidae) comprises three morphologically cryptic species. BMC Evolutionary Biology 14: 153.
